text: Vini Ricordi–Pinarello–Sidermec was a professional Italian cycling team. The team existed from 1982 to 1986. The team was in the 1983 Tour de France. They won the mountains classification. Their leader was Lucien Van Impe. In that classification, they won 3 stages. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:1986 disestablishments in Italy Category:1982 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Italy Category:Cycling teams Category:Sports teams in Italy
title: Vini Ricordi–Pinarello–Sidermec
